ygData.subject: Re: Potter site
ygData.msgSnippet: still never heard anything definite on deities...was rumors a while back that the cookie cutter sketches were involved, but no luck with anything tried... as
ygData.messageBody:
still never heard anything definite on deities...was rumors a while back
that the cookie cutter sketches were involved, but no luck with anything
tried...
as far as i know, skill maxes at 168 with lined poison vials.
was selling around 1 - 1.5 for normal vials before, but prices may rise a
bit since enchanters will need them too once the new spells work...sold 40
for 2pp each yesterday to one...
think i was asking 2-3 for lined, but not much luck selling them...still got
80 left from maxing my skill...

also how is begging? haven't met too many who have built up that skill...and
have heard rumors of faction problems with it?

Xillitil/Povar
(Master potter,cook,brewer,smith,fletcher, learning jeweler and
tailor...skills are fun :)

>From: dtruitt@...
>
>Does anyone know of a really good potter site? I was wondering or have
>been
>asked how to make small dieties. I'm certain I've met one person who has
>made
>them before (but I wasn't a potter back then). Does someone have the
>recipe
>for that? Also what is the highest skill level achieved at pottery so far?
> Any suggestions for pricing poison vials? I'm waivering between 1pp and
>2pp
>for regular ones.
>
>Thanks - Tanana, Bristlebane
>Master Potter
>Master Brewer
>Excellant Beggar
